column4: oh... an interesting issue... anyone got freezes on system test in 9.10?
not tried... karmic being stable for me since past 2 weeks
yeah - it's stable for me either... and there are no problems at all, except the system test tool :) goto: System->Administration->System Test
ok will do. it kills the PC i gather :)
lol --> see you in the bluescreehell ;)
how about compiz? is it better? I removed it cos was slowing down my PC something rotten
it depends on your hardware i think :)
what kind of graphik card do you have?
maybe i don't have enough ram?
or there is a problem with the driver
i have a X1300 bulti into my HP NC6400 with 128 MB GDDR :) it works very well :-/
it worked ok before, was in karmic when it went odd
so, i suppose there is some trouble with the driver used...
maybe it'll get better after the release :)
not tried since a couplaweeks, maybe will test again now :)
